sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>village</radical> you always think of first is your <kanji>hometown</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Why would you ever talk about the village where someone else was born? Answer: you wouldn't. Everything is always about you.
readingMnemonic: Your <kanji>hometown</kanji> is where you <reading>sat</reading> (<ja>さと</ja>), nostalgia tugging at your heartstrings amid the endless rice fields and dirt.
readingInfo: Visualize yourself sitting in your hometown, the village's rustic charm evoking nostalgia.
